altername_name: STEINS;GATE ダイバージェンシズアソート
name: Steins;Gate: Divergencies Assort
overview: Steins;Gate: Divergencies Assort (STEINS;GATE ダイバージェンシズアソート) is a collection of three Steins;Gate visual novels that was initially released on the Nintendo Switch on March 20, 2019 in Japan. The title includes Steins;Gate 0, Steins;Gate: Linear Bounded Phenogram, and Steins;Gate: My Darling's Embrace.
